org.apache.hadoop.thriftfs.jobtracker.api

Interface Jobtracker.Iface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HadoopServiceBase.Iface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Jobtracker.Client
    Enclosing class:
    Jobtracker

    public static interface Jobtracker.Iface
extends HadoopServiceBase.Iface
    A proxy service onto a Jobtracker, exposing read-only methods for cluster monitoring
